song_title: I Love the Way You Love Me

Verse: I like the feel of your name on my lips
And I like the sound of your sweet gentle kiss
The way that your fingers run through my hair
And how your scent lingers even when you're not there
And I like the way your eyes dance when you laugh
And how you enjoy your two-hour bath
And how you've convinced me to dance in the rain
With everyone watching like we were insane
And I like the sound of old R&B
And you roll your eyes when I'm sloppily off-key
And I like the innocent way that you cry
From sappy old movies you've seen thousands of times
Chorus: But I love the way you love me, oh, baby
Strong and wild, slow and easy
I love the way you love me
And I love the way you love me, oh, baby
Strong and wild, slow and easy
I love the way you love me
I love the way you love me, oh, baby
Heart and soul (Heart and) so completely
I love the way you love me
I love the way you that love meEmbed
Bridge: And I could list a million things
I love to like about you (About you)
But they could all come down to one reason (To one reason)
I could never live without you
